physical_form.properties: Lightweight, malleable, high strength-to-weight ratio, recyclable.
physical_form.application: Primary can body and ends. Allows for shaping and provides structural integrity.

physical_form.material_name: Steel (Tin-Free Steel/TFS or Electrolytic Chromium Coated Steel/ECCS)
physical_form.properties: Strong, corrosion-resistant (when coated), magnetic for easy handling in filling lines.
physical_form.application: Alternative can body material, often used for larger can sizes or when magnetic handling is preferred.

physical_form.properties: Food-grade, prevents beer from reacting with the metal, BPA-free options available, flexible.
physical_form.application: Internal lining of the can to prevent corrosion and maintain beer flavor.

physical_form.properties: Durable, resistant to abrasion and chemicals, provides high-quality graphics, low VOC options available.
physical_form.application: External printing of labels, branding, and product information.

physical_form.properties: Protects ink from scratching and wear, provides a glossy or matte finish, improves aesthetic appeal.
physical_form.application: Applied over the printed ink layer for protection and visual enhancement.

physical_form.properties: Provides a hermetic seal, flexible, food-grade.
physical_form.application: Sealant between the easy-open end and the can body to ensure airtight closure.
Secures the pull tab to the easy-open end.

physical_form.properties: Lightweight, malleable, easy to grip and pull.
physical_form.application: Enables convenient opening of the can without tools.
Injected into the headspace to reduce oxidation and maintain product quality.
Used in the seaming process to create a hermetic seal between the can body and ends.

fragility.properties: Durable but can dent under pressure, especially when empty. Susceptible to bending at seams.
fragility.application: Primary can structure; requires careful handling during transportation and storage to prevent damage.

fragility.properties: More resistant to denting than aluminum, but can still deform under significant impact.
fragility.application: Can body material; provides higher resistance to deformation than aluminum.

fragility.properties: Flexible but can crack or flake if the can is severely deformed, compromising barrier properties.
fragility.application: Protective layer; maintain integrity of the coating to prevent beer from contacting the metal.

fragility.properties: The pull tab area is a point of weakness, susceptible to accidental opening or damage during rough handling.
fragility.application: End closure; requires careful design to prevent premature opening.

fragility.properties: The joined area of the can body. Susceptible to leaks if improperly formed or damaged.
fragility.application: Joins the can body. Critical to ensure a hermetic seal.

fragility.properties: The joined area between the can body and the end. Susceptible to leaks if improperly formed or damaged.
fragility.application: Joins the can end to the body; critical to ensure a hermetic seal.

fragility.properties: Relatively brittle; susceptible to scratches and abrasions, especially during transport.
fragility.application: External decoration; protect from excessive friction during transit.

fragility.properties: Malleable and can bend or break if excessive force is applied, especially during handling.
fragility.application: Opening mechanism; avoid excessive bending or force during transportation and stocking.

fragility.properties: If the adhesive fails, the seam can weaken, leading to leakage and potential product spoilage.
fragility.application: Bonds the can ends to the body; proper adhesive application and curing are essential.

fragility.properties: Maintaining a stable headspace pressure helps reduce internal pressure and potential can deformation.
fragility.application: Reduces oxidation. Requires precise filling to ensure effectiveness.

shelf_life.properties: Excellent barrier to light and oxygen, extending shelf life.
shelf_life.application: Can body; protects beer from degradation due to light and oxygen exposure.

shelf_life.properties: Prevents interaction between the beer and the metal, preserving flavor and preventing corrosion for extended periods.
shelf_life.application: Internal lining; prevents metallic taste and maintains beer quality over time.

shelf_life.properties: Ensures a hermetic seal, preventing oxygen ingress and maintaining carbonation.
shelf_life.application: Sealant at the can seams; critical for maintaining airtight closure and preventing spoilage.

shelf_life.properties: Inert gas used to displace oxygen in the headspace, minimizing oxidation.
shelf_life.application: Headspace filler; reduces oxidation and maintains beer flavor and aroma.

shelf_life.properties: UV-resistant inks prevent fading and degradation of graphics over time, maintaining aesthetic appeal.
shelf_life.application: External decoration; ensure the label remains legible and attractive throughout the shelf life.

shelf_life.properties: Maintains sealing properties over time, preventing leakage and oxygen ingress.
shelf_life.application: Sealing compound for easy-open ends; crucial for maintaining a hermetic seal.

shelf_life.properties: Maintains bond strength and integrity over the product's shelf life, preventing seam failure and leakage.
shelf_life.application: Bonds can ends; ensures a hermetic seal throughout the shelf life.

shelf_life.properties: Resistant to corrosion and degradation, ensuring the easy-open tab remains functional.
shelf_life.application: Secures the pull tab. Its integrity is important for can opening.

shelf_life.properties: A naturally forming or applied layer that prevents further oxidation of the aluminum, contributing to long-term stability.
Proper can design to withstand internal pressure and external forces, preventing bulging or deformation over time.
shelf_life.application: Structural integrity. A well-designed can is essential for a long shelf life.

chemical_properties.properties: Resistant to corrosion in neutral pH environments but can corrode in highly acidic or alkaline conditions.
chemical_properties.application: Can body; must be protected by an internal coating.

chemical_properties.properties: Requires a protective coating to prevent rust and interaction with the beer.
chemical_properties.application: Can body; the coating provides a barrier against corrosion.

chemical_properties.properties: Provides a chemically inert barrier between the beer and the metal, preventing metallic taste and corrosion. BPA-free options are increasingly common.
chemical_properties.application: Internal lining; prevents interaction with beer.

chemical_properties.properties: Alternative to epoxy, offering good chemical resistance and flexibility. Often BPA-free.
chemical_properties.application: Internal lining; provides a protective barrier.

chemical_properties.properties: Resistant to chemicals and solvents, preventing leaching or discoloration.
chemical_properties.application: External printing; maintains the integrity of the printed graphics.

chemical_properties.properties: Provides a protective layer against chemicals and abrasion, preventing ink damage.
chemical_properties.application: Protective overcoat; protects the ink layer.

chemical_properties.properties: Must be chemically compatible with beer and resistant to degradation from alcohol and other beer components.
chemical_properties.application: Sealant at the can seams; maintains a hermetic seal.

chemical_properties.properties: Inert and does not react with beer or other components within the can.
Creates a stable, non-reactive surface, preventing further oxidation and interaction with the beer.
Used during can manufacturing to reduce friction; must be non-toxic and food-grade.
chemical_properties.application: Manufacturing process; ensures smooth can formation and prevents contamination.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Non-porous and easy to clean and sterilize during manufacturing. Requires proper cleaning to remove any residue.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Can body; must be thoroughly cleaned before filling.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Also non-porous and easy to clean. Requires rigorous cleaning to prevent contamination.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Can body alternative; also needs thorough cleaning.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Provides a smooth, non-porous surface that is easy to sanitize, preventing bacterial growth.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Internal lining; must be properly applied and cured to prevent contamination.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Similar to epoxy, providing a sanitary internal surface. Requires proper application.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Internal lining; provides a hygienic barrier.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Must be food-grade and resistant to microbial growth, preventing contamination at the seams.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Sealant at the can seams; critical to prevent microbial ingress.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Inert and sterile, preventing the introduction of bacteria or other contaminants.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Headspace filler; maintains a sterile environment.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Food-grade and resistant to microbial growth, maintaining the integrity of the seal.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Sealant for easy-open ends; prevents microbial ingress.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Must be food-grade and prevent microbial growth in the seam area.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Bonds can ends; ensures hygienic seal.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Used during manufacturing to remove any residues or contaminants from the can. Must be food-grade and effectively removed before filling.
Potable and free from microorganisms to ensure no contamination during rinsing.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Good temperature resistance, but extreme temperatures can affect the internal pressure and potentially cause deformation.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Can body; avoid extreme temperature fluctuations.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Similar temperature properties to aluminum. Susceptible to pressure changes from temperature variations.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Can body alternative; handle with similar temperature considerations.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Generally stable at typical beverage temperatures, but extreme heat or cold can affect its adhesion and flexibility.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Internal lining; avoid excessive temperature fluctuations.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Similar to epoxy in temperature sensitivity. Maintain consistent storage temperatures.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Internal lining alternative; similar temperature management.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Temperature fluctuations can affect the sealant's flexibility and adhesion, potentially compromising the seal.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Sealant at the can seams; avoid extreme temperature variations.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: The pressure of nitrogen gas is temperature-dependent, affecting the internal pressure of the can.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Headspace filler; manage temperature to control internal pressure.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Temperature can affect the compound's sealing properties, potentially leading to leakage.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Sealant for easy-open ends; maintain consistent temperatures.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Extreme temperatures can cause the ink to fade or crack and the varnish to become brittle.
temperature_sensitivity.application: External decoration; avoid extreme heat or cold exposure.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Extreme temperatures can weaken the adhesive bond, leading to seam failure.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Bonds can ends; temperature control is important.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Condensation formation due to temperature differences may cause corrosion.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Overall can integrity. Avoid rapid temperature change.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Non-volatile and generally safe, but aluminum dust can be a fire or explosion hazard under specific conditions in manufacturing facilities.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Can body; manage dust during manufacturing.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Similar to aluminum; low volatility. Steel dust poses similar risks in manufacturing.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Can body alternative; dust control during manufacturing.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Typically non-volatile once cured, but some epoxy resins may contain volatile organic compounds (VOCs) during application. BPA content is a potential health concern (though BPA-free options are available).
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Internal lining; use low-VOC options and BPA-free formulations.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Similar to epoxy regarding VOCs and volatility. Ensure proper ventilation during application.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Internal lining alternative; manage VOCs during application.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Low VOC content compared to solvent-based inks, but proper ventilation is still necessary during printing.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: External printing; use low-VOC inks and ensure proper ventilation.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Similar to inks; low VOC content with UV-cured options. Manage ventilation during application.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Protective overcoat; low VOC options are preferred.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Non-toxic and inert, but can displace oxygen and create an asphyxiation hazard in confined spaces.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Headspace filler; ensure adequate ventilation in filling areas.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: May be flammable or toxic. Require careful handling, storage, and disposal according to safety regulations.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Manufacturing process; follow safety protocols for solvent use.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Some lubricants may be flammable or cause skin irritation. Use appropriate PPE during handling.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Manufacturing process; follow safety guidelines for lubricant use.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Some adhesives can release volatile organic compounds (VOCs) during application and curing. Use low-VOC options and ensure proper ventilation.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Bonds can ends; use low-VOC adhesives and ensure ventilation.

visibility_and_display.properties: Provides high-resolution graphics and vibrant colors for attractive branding and product information.
visibility_and_display.application: External printing; critical for visual appeal.

visibility_and_display.properties: Offers a glossy or matte finish, enhancing the visual appeal and protecting the ink layer.
Provides a smooth surface for printing, allowing for detailed graphics and text.
visibility_and_display.application: Can body; serves as the canvas for branding and information.

visibility_and_display.properties: Allows for 360-degree graphics and vibrant colors, enhancing shelf appeal.
visibility_and_display.application: Alternative labeling; provides maximum visual impact.

visibility_and_display.properties: Adds a tactile element to the can, enhancing the perceived quality and brand image.
visibility_and_display.application: Optional surface treatment; enhances tactile and visual appeal.

visibility_and_display.properties: Adds unique visual effects to attract consumer attention.
Creates permanent, high-resolution markings directly on the can surface.
visibility_and_display.application: Alternative marking; provides a premium look.

visibility_and_display.properties: Unique can shapes can enhance shelf appeal and brand recognition.
visibility_and_display.application: Structural Design; unique shapes draw the eye.

visibility_and_display.properties: Allows partial visibility of the can's contents or underlying surface, creating a unique visual effect.
visibility_and_display.application: Labeling Option; can be aesthetically pleasing.

visibility_and_display.properties: Enable integration of digital content and marketing with the physical product.
visibility_and_display.application: Informational and Marketing; links to digital information.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Determines the can volume, directly influencing the quantity of beer contained.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Can body; dictates the fill volume.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Precise amount of nitrogen injected to maintain proper headspace pressure and prevent oxidation.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Headspace filler; affects product quality and shelf life.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: The thickness and coverage of the ink layer affect the legibility of product information and branding.
quantity_and_dosage.application: External printing; affects readability and visual appeal.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: The thickness of the varnish layer affects the level of protection and the final visual finish.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Protective overcoat; affects durability and appearance.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: The thickness and integrity of the internal coating ensure complete protection of the beer.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Internal lining; proper application is crucial.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: The amount of sealant used at the seams must be precise to ensure a hermetic seal.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Sealant at the can seams; critical for preventing leaks.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Precise amount required to ensure a strong, hermetic bond between can body and ends.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Bonds can ends; strength of the bond important.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Affects the overall fill volume and dimensions of the package.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Structural Design; volume of the can.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: The dimensions and material properties ensure proper functionality during opening.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Opening mechanism; design critical for ease of use.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: The amount and type of lubricant used during can forming processes must be precisely controlled.
quantity_and_dosage.application: Can manufacturing process. Precise application is needed.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Recyclable materials can be a target for metal theft, especially in large quantities.
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Can body; consider security measures for scrap metal.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Sophisticated printing techniques and security inks can deter counterfeiting.
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: External printing; use advanced printing technologies to combat counterfeiting.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Provide a visual deterrent to counterfeiting and enhance brand security.
Indicate if the can has been opened or tampered with.
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Security seal; provides visual indication of tampering.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.material_name: Unique Can Identifiers (e.g., Serial Numbers, QR Codes)
value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Enable tracking and authentication of individual cans.
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Tracking and Authentication; provides unique identification.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Difficult to replicate, adding a layer of security against counterfeiting.
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Surface Treatment; complicates replication by counterfeiters.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Enable tracking and inventory management, helping to prevent theft and diversion.
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Tracking and Inventory; manages stock levels and prevents theft.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Ensuring the integrity of the supply chain is crucial to prevent product diversion and theft.
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Logistics; protects against theft throughout the supply chain.
Security seals; authentication for security purposes.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Make cans stronger and resist tampering.
